articles.author: Ryan Vlastelica
articles.title: Apple Decouples From Nasdaq as AI ‘Whack-a-Mole’ Grips Market - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: It’s been nearly 20 years since Apple Inc. was this untethered from its tech peers, giving investors an appealing alternative to the artificial intelligence-fueled volatility that has gripped most other corners of the stock market in recent weeks.
